p: Phenological observations to develop and validate the phenological model were not available for AIG and SIO, but instead for several other locations. For two vineyards in Changins (CGI) and Leytron (LEY), temperature was reconstructed to fit the timespan of observed phenological data from 1958 to 2012 for CGI and 1977 to 2014 for LEY. Data from the Agrometeo Service ( www.agrometeo.ch) were used for CGI for the years 1998 to 2015 and for LEY for the years 2003 to 2014, and Meteoswiss ( www.meteoswiss.ch) data for the stations Pully (PUY), Geneva (GVE), Evionnaz (EVI), and Sion (SIO) for the periods 1978 to 2015, 1957 to 2015, 1993 to 2014, and 1976 to 2015, respectively (Table 1).
